@friedgold @edgarwright shaunofthedead cornettotrilogy simonpegg edgarwright nickfrost 2danimation loopanimation motiongraphics motiondesign characterdesign gfxmob zombie madewithmoho moho weloveanimations 750750 Date of publication: 07.01.2019 This weekend at the @phillycomiccon couple of the @phillyavengers got to meet @friedgold.
Nick Frost was awesome!!! We let him know what we do for charities and he was so generous!
He donated four signed photos for us to auction off for our charities.
He went above and beyond with his altruism!!! We then presented him with certificate making him an honorary member of the Philadelphia Avengers.
Along with patch, that he really enjoyed.
Thank you Mr. Frost for the wonderful donation and the great story behind the Star Wars parody!

great little event at Nottingham.
Thanks to who all came by and saw us!

cornetto mondo shaunofthedead hotfuzz theworldsend edgarwright simonpegg nickfrost AP sale posters art illustration horror vintage @mondonews 10801350 Date of publication: 18.03.2019 Happy Halloween!
Edgar Wright walked past me while was uploading these earlier so didn’t post them properly, was too distracted...
I’ve now fixed it and here they are!
Shaun of the Dead 2004 seemed like perfect film to explore for this season and so went to see which little locations could find.
To my surprise, lot hadn’t changed!
had to return to this shop first shot over couple of days as realised my first try at the photo didn’t line-up fully!
It’s so slight but I’m such perfectionist The Cornetto Trilogy has been with me for so long now, it’s joy to visit these british masterpieces!
Tonight was finally able to listen to, in person, the man behind all of these films: Edgar Wright.
He was fantastic!
He came in full fancy dress of course as Sweeney Todd.
David Walliams also made very randomly appreciated appearance as the host.
Have spookingly scary or frightfully happy Halloween night!
shaunofthedead zombies death hotfuzz police theworldsend edgarwright simonpegg nickfrost director acting horror halloween happyhalloween blood cornetto film photography 1080745 Date of publication: 31.10.2018 Really grateful to have the opportunity to collaborate on portrait with my latest subject.
Not quite sure what will emerge but with such warm open personality I’m sure it’ll be enjoyable!
Read or listen to his book ‘Truths, Half Truths and Little White Lies’ to find out more.
His personal journey, so unassumingly expressed, and interest in figurative painting make him great subject for portrait.
In this study I’ve focused on the openness of his character coming through in the immediacy of his face.
I’m also looking closer at subtle colour shifts and mark making in the skin whilst trying to avoid being photorealistic.
So many great artists already do that much better than ever will!
do however want to try to retain painting language whilst working in close up detail.
